reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup**

*RDA/ Velocity Coil/ 6 Wrap Single Fused Kanthal Clapton 2×26 core 32 wrap W/ 45 Wicking/ Full Rayon Ω/0.26*

**Testing**


Steep Time/4 weeks % Used/ 1.2  PG/VG 50/50 Nic%/0


**Mouthfeel**

Light on the tongue and nose with a sharp mouthful and a light density 3 out of 10

**Throat Hit**4/10

**Flavor Properties**

A nice sharp herbal basil flavoring, uniquely earthy and savory, definitely has a fresh and bright Garden basil quality to it, also has very light floral notes. This is a extremely realistic flavoring and has fantastic umami.

**Relatable Flavors**

This is a completely unique flavoring and dead on perfect representation fresh basil. If I was trying to describe it without saying basil I would say it's like mint without the mint if that makes any sense at all.

**Off flavors**

Nothing really off here but it is worth mentioning requires a long steep at least 10 days before that green flavor like fresh-cut grass dissipates.

**Position In The Recipe**

Should work well as a base note in any savory recipe, or a top note in any sort of dessert or Bakery recipe.

**Pairings**

Creams, tobacco's, other savouries such as Rosemary,spice flavorings, and bakeries.(I think you'd be really surprised how awesome a little basil is on a donut.)

**Recipe**

https://alltheflavors.com/recipes/7876#creamy_tomatum_soup_by_chrisdvr1

**Notes**

I tested this at 0.8% first with about a month long steep and was surprised I really couldn't taste the flavor.

Here is a Wikipedia on basil if you're interested in learning, more and where are you can buy this fantastic flavor.

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basil

http://www.bullcityvapor.com/zen-garden-fa/

**Rating** 98/100

**Please if your opinion differs, or you have another review for this post it in the comments. Will help the master list with multiple reviews in one spot.**
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: Zen Garden
